hackathon-description-text: AR/VR designers, developers, sound engineers, graphic artists, creatives, domain experts, and enthusiasts
hackathon-eligibility: Almost everyone is welcome to apply. The hackathon organizers are committed to building a diverse field of participants that is inspiring and safe for people of all races, countries of origin, gender, sexual preference, or just generally represent the diversity of the human race.
hackathon-rules:
Rules and the code of conduct will be posted on the website and on DevPost in January.
The rules will be similar to the hackathon

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Multiple cash prizes plus product prizes

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3607 Trousdale Pkwy, Los Angeles, CA 90089, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
The first round will be judged by 6 panels of 3 judges who will pick the finalists. 

The second round will pick the winners. A panel of 7 industry experts will choose the winning teams. 

Some sponsors will award separate prizes

hackathon-location-address: 3607 Trousdale Pkwy, Los Angeles, CA 90089, USA
hackathon-description-header: Apply to participate in the Creating Reality Hackathon -  Deepen your understanding of the AR and VR working in interdisciplinary teams
